screen_desc: The screenshot shows the home screen of an Android smartphone, displaying a grid of app icons including Maps, Play Store, Chrome, Google, Settings, Camera, Calendar, and others. The screen is organized in rows of app icons, providing quick access to various applications.

action_plan: Stop pressing the Back button and do not open any new application.

action_result: You have successfully opened the Chrome browser, which is now displayed on your screen. This action was necessary to access web pages or search for information, which aligns with the user's request to open Google Chrome.
